title: How to convert league highlight files?
body: Hi, I was hoping to add one of my highlights from league into a montage I am making but couldn't find any way to save it as another file while keeping the audio. I tried saving as a .avi and .mp4 but neither transferred the sound along with the video from the original HTML video. Any solution?

replies.body:
You could screencap or record the highlight with another program. There may be a bit of quality loss due to compression and the like, but it should work for what you're trying to achieve.

Let me know if you have any questions!

I am attempting what he was trying to do as well, but this creates wayyy too much of a dramatic loss in frames, skipping ~1.25 seconds out of every frame. lol
Is there another way that the file can be converted? Or are we not allowed to?

I cannot recommend converting the file, as it is likely not to work or corrupt the file entirely if you don't make a backup of it before trying the conversion. I'd say the method I listed above is the best bet at getting highlight footage in another format.

Hit me up if you have any other questions.
